noun.description: A chivalrous, courteous, or honorable man.
examples: he behaved like a perfect gentleman

noun.description: A polite or formal way of referring to a man.
examples: opposite her an old gentleman sat reading

origin: Middle English (in the sense man of noble birth): from gentle + man, translating Old French gentilz hom. In later use the term denoted a man of a good family (especially one entitled to a coat of arms) but not of the nobility.
